name: A Handful of Luck
description:
How to play:

In village, you can visit:


  • shop - to buy some equipment;
  • tavern - to get new dice after each return from dungeon;
  • dungeon - the dangerous place, full of monsters.

In dungeon you can encounter two types of rooms:

  • battle;
  • non-battle.

In battle, you can choose 1 out of 3 possible options:

  • attack
  • defence
  • attempt to escape

Then, you need put 0-2 dice from your stash at the bottom of screen into slots for your action. You sometimes also need put extra dice in slots for enemies' actions.

You have a limited amount of dice. You can hold up to 3 dice in hand at a time. When you run out of dice, extra dice added from the deck (amount of dice in deck is displayed on your right).

To move a die, you need to click on it and then click on an empty slot. Be careful, you can't take it back!  After you use up a die, it goes to a discard pile (amount is shown on your right).

The same idea of movement is applicable to equipment and equipment slots.


In dungeons, press "Continue" button to proceed. Do it until the end of the dungeon.

In non-battle rooms, you need (sometimes it is optional) to put a die to check success of some action and then go further.

When dungeon ends, you can visit shop and tavern to upgrade your dice and equipment. Notice that you can only equip your items in the village. 

Then you can go to the dungeon again.

  • Tooltips

Hover cursor over a die or an item to see info about it.

  • Death & Goal

After death, you will lose your equipment, but save half of your money and all your dice. Improve your set of dice to finish all 6 floors.
